data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Osaka, Japan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osaka, Japan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Osaka, Japan who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Osaka, Japan.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, encourage the 50,188 believers in Osaka to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 8,864,200 people living in Osaka, Japan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, 1.5% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 8,864,200 people living in the state of Osaka.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Osaka.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Osaka, Japan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Osaka
